description:
The fedora is the single malt of the hat world, classic and classy. Bringing both sun protection and style, Tilley’s Banded Fedora is made from a light braided raffia that is right at home in hot climates.

  • Bold grosgrain band
  • Cool raffia construction
  • Wide brim provides 360° sun protection
name: Tilley Banded Fedora Hat - Unisex
